Please visit the official FAQ's website,

Brawler students are taught to harness the latent powers stored deep within their bodies and use this as their greatest weapon. Only students demonstrating high strength and coordination test scores qualify for this course, as Brawlers have shunned all armed conflict, choosing instead to embrace combat in its purest, basest form. They study to master the art of close range combat.

Swordsman students go through the most rigorous training as they have to be masters of precision, strength and agility. They embrace the way of the sword, living their life not only on the edge but by the edge. Students belonging to this class are formidable opponents as they have the highest defense. Their goal is to deal a blow that is swift, clean, and most of all, final.

The true mark of graduates of Archery is that they never miss a target. Their skill with the bow is matchless; their speed, supreme. Great allies in every battle, these students are the master of long ranged combat. Once they unleash their arrows, they become unstoppable. Their superior evasion skills serve as their greatest defense.

Brawler students are taught to harness the latent powers stored deep within their bodies and use this as their greatest weapon. Only students demonstrating high strength and coordination test scores qualify for this course, as Brawlers have shunned all armed conflict, choosing instead to embrace combat in its purest, basest form. They study to master the art of close range combat.

Shaman students are the masters of martial arts and Qi manipulation. Those who aim to take on this course must be prepared to practice strict discipline and enduring patience. Shaman students have the strongest spirituality and highest intelligence among the classes. Accomplished Shamans can command the elements and even call elemental guardians to aid them in battle.
nUsing spear and wands to channel their Qi and execute perfect martial arts, Shamans may choose to use their energy to heal and buff others or command mass destruction.

Sacred Gate Campus is the first educational institution built by the Sacred Financial Group. Boasting Eastern infrastructures and designs, this campus is the center of History, Social Science, Language and Literature. It also boasts a huge library dedicated to Shamanism and researches related to martial arts.

Mystic Peak is the second campus to be created by the Sacred Financial Group located at the Northern area of RAN world. Its aura reflects the grandeur of Western civilizations in their prime. The stained glass windows, scenic plazas, and rich flora and fauna reflect the academe’s dedication to the Arts and Natural Science.

TPhoenix campus is the third educational institution of the Sacred Financial Group. Its campus is located in the Southern area of the RAN world. Renowned for its advanced engineering curriculum, this campus fascinates the members of high society. Phoenix offers the engineers and scientists of tomorrow access to the most expensive and advanced technology, free to test out their theories and experiments.
GameGuard file does not exist or is corrupted. Please install the GameGuard setup file.
Window system files might be corrupted. Please reinstall the Internet Explorer(IE).
Error occurred while running GameGuard. Please send all *.erl files in GameGuard folder to Game2@inca.co.kr via email.
Fail to run GameGuard. Please reinstall the GameGuard setup file.
GameGuard is already running. Try rebooting first and executing the game again.
There are multiple events of game execution or GameGuard is already running. Close the game then try again.
Illegal program detected. Close all the unnecessary programs before running the game.
GameGuard initialization error. Try rebooting and executing the game or close the program considered to cause a collision.
Failed to load virus and hacking tool scanning module. Possibly due to lack of memory or virus infection.
GameGuard update has been aborted. Please check the status of Internet network or personal firewall settings when unable to connect continuously.
Fail to complete GameGuard update. Suspend Anti-Virus program temporarily and try the game, or check the settings of PC management programs if any.
Fail to connect the GameGuard update server. Please try again after a while, or check personal Firewall settings if any.
